summary: This series explores the concept of 'ecosystem architecture,' a response to the fragmentation of the internet and tech industry. Drawing parallels with Earth's tectonic shifts and adopting principles of decentralization and regenerative design, it aims to create sustainable, interdisciplinary digital ecosystems that foster innovation and a healthier environment.
excerpt: This series explores 'ecosystem architecture,' a response to internet fragmentation, aiming to build sustainable, interdisciplinary digital ecosystems inspired by decentralization and regenerative design.
